bluej.codecoverage.utils.join

Interface ClassInfo

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileClassInfo

    public interface ClassInfo
    Represents a source file located on the machine.

    This allows for easier pairing of coverage information to specific lines. TODO: change to iterator?

    Author:
    Ian
    See Also:
    Locatable

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getId()
      A Unique Id for the instance.
      java.lang.String getLine(int lineNum)
      Returns the text at the specified line number.
      java.lang.String getName()
      The name of the file as stored on the local filesystem.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        The name of the file as stored on the local filesystem.
        Returns:
        the full name of the file, including the path.

      • getLine

        java.lang.String getLine(int lineNum)
        Returns the text at the specified line number.
        Parameters:
        lineNum - line to get text for.
        Returns:
        The entire String between the start of the line, and the end of the line.

      • getId

        java.lang.String getId()
        A Unique Id for the instance.
        Returns:
        a UUID for identifying the class.

      • getNumberOfLines

        int getNumberOfLines()
        Returns the total number of lines in the file.

        The caller will be able to call getLine(int) for all values 0 <= n < the return of this method.

        Returns:
        number of lines in the file.
